name: kagi-fastgpt-sidebar
description: sidebar using Kagi FastGPT API to answer questions about web pages

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:chrome && bun run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: bun run copy:chrome && bun run package:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: bun run copy:firefox && bun run package:firefox
scripts.copy:chrome: mkdir -p dist/chrome && cp -r icons dist/chrome/ && cp background.js content.js sidebar.css toggle-sidebar.js dist/chrome/ && cp manifest.json dist/chrome/
scripts.copy:firefox: mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp -r icons dist/firefox/ && cp background.js content.js sidebar.css toggle-sidebar.js dist/firefox/ && node scripts/create-firefox-manifest.js
scripts.submit:firefox: bun run copy:firefox && cd dist/firefox && web-ext sign --channel=listed --amo-metadata=../../amo-metadata.json --api-key=$WEB_EXT_API_KEY --api-secret=$WEB_EXT_API_SECRET
scripts.dev:chrome: bun run copy:chrome && echo 'Chrome development build ready in dist/chrome'
scripts.dev:firefox: bun run copy:firefox && echo 'Firefox development build ready in dist/firefox'

author: 0xgingi
